author: johnh
msg: Not HTML escaping attributes any longer, but instead escaping only double-quotes.

author: jdcasey
msg: Introducing String.indexOf-based interpolator to improve performance, since the regular expressions used in the regex-based interpolator weren't really useful enough to justify the CPU hit.
